Prowess
[i]Magecraft[/i] – Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

rules_text2:
Flying, trample
[i]Battalion[/i] – Whenever Bloodgem Hellkite attacks and at least two other creatures you control attack, conquer target opponent.
Whenever you conquer a player, create a Treasure token.
